articles.author: Jessica Gresko
articles.title: Supreme Court expands gun rights, with nation divided - The Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — In a major expansion of gun rights, the Supreme Court said Thursday that Americans have a right to carry firearms in public for self-defense, a ruling likely to lead to more people legally armed in cities and beyond.

articles.author: Zhang Nannan
articles.title: Scientists observe longitudinal plasmonic field in nanocavity at subnano-scale - Phys.org
articles.description: A group of scientists working on surface-enhanced Raman spectroscopy (SERS) has made a nanoruler to provide insight into the longitudinal plasmonic fields in nanocavities, according to research published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society.

articles.title: American country music star Luke Combs reveals All Blacks dream - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: Luke Combs was one try from rugby glory, but he traded it all for Crocs and a microphone.
